Tell me...how many guys do you have to play before you are satisfied? How many hearts must you break? Why did you have to play me? The words you spoke, are now meaningless. Now I know that when you say 'one and only' You mean, as long as there wasn't another.... When you say I love you, you mean I love whoever gives me the most ass wiping. You never cease to break my heart....I can't believe...those words meant so much to me, when they meant nothing to you. I don't know how I could love such a hollow person... But... I do hate you, for everything...yet... I love you so god damned much...I had to let go, don't you understand? Haven't you ever stepped back and saw what you were doing? You were going to do the 'unthinkable'....Wasn't that god damned obvious?

In response to Celina's question... Yes I have! and...its not pretty. It hurts, no? Especially if it's right in front of your fucking face.... To add to the pain, they just happened to realize that you're there and go back to say you still mean so much... How can you really know how much you mean to others? Or tell others how much they mean to you? I'm sorry, but it's not the fucking words you use...even though they may mean so much to you. It's what you do....you're actions. If you don't show someone you love them through your actions....how....how would they ever fucking know? ...How would I know that you wouldn't do the unthinkable? I don't. I was scared you would because...I seem to know you better, and I know what you want. It wasn't what you thought you wanted. Btw, you can sure turn around real fast on that...It's as if your words all those months were simply...meaningless. I have to say you played me fucking good. I'm sure you feel happy now, actually I know, having people at your finger tips...how could you...seriously, how can you play people like that....You know what they want, and you know they don't want your friendship. Fuck, I'd rather be a loner! How many hearts must you break? How many tiil you're satisfied? Or do you just want to leave people's hearts hanging on a string, just about to break, but you, the great messiah, is there to pull that string up, just enough? I just to say...you may be a wonderful person. But you don't care about others... You don't care about the person. You care about all that attention you get, you think it is not obvious? .... I need to take a walk...

Am I strange for limiting my social connections, rather than expanding them? I do not know, but what I know is that I do not wish to know anyone more because, less to care about, less to worry about... Isn't it better that way? Why burden yourself, and have to spread your energy and care to so many people? I rather just care about the few people that matter to me, so I can at least have a better chance of helping them out, and being a friend.
You know what? Maybe I didn't break so many promises... Remember, forever, is a long time...but we can deal with that, no?

When you reflect upon your life, and you're looking at who are your friends and why, remember this. What does a friend mean to you & what is it you ask of them? What do you expect from yourself in a friendship? How far will you go to keep a friend? and How far will you go for a friend? Also, acquaintances and friends are VERY different. So if I do not act like a friend, it's probably because I consider you an acquaintance. -------------------- For me...a friend means a lot. I do not like to use 'best' friend because...well if you are my friend, I put you all on this leve playing field. Because, you all mean a lot to me, and I could not rank you, but make no mistake, you are all the best.

I would just like to say, EO is really gay! It's owned by a bunch of snotty kids who pay a few bucks and live on it. Which is real sad, and I have to say unprofessional. Just because someone donates money doesn't mean you give them all the powers in the world. I dunno...this may sound weird, but in this case it's like you're trying to appeal to their evil side? You're giving them all this power and such. You can tell they're in it for the power because EO is not something you would wanna simply donate because you like it...I'm sorry, but it's too poor. As far as I've seen when you 'donate', wether to a website or charity...you do it because you care and because you simply want to help out! Maybe because it's a good cause, or the people are doing a superb job and you want to show your appreciate. NOT because you want some administrative powers or your fucking name on some shit. Oh well, lesson kids: You can buy yourself all the power you want, but will you really be satisfied in that investment? OR would you feel better giving that money somewhere it just might matter? P.S This might sound weird...it's one of those good vs. bad kinda things, I guess

They knock you down, I'll pick you up! They laugh at you, I'll Shut them UP! ---------------------- The key is to not get yourself in such deep hole. Then it's a hell of a lot easier to just reach up and pull yourself out...but sometimes you just want to dig the hole a lil deeper and see what you'll find... Then when you find something so beautiful...you don't want to let go of it, then you want to keep on digging until you find something quite as beautiful. But you never will. You'll find only emptiness, and if you're lucky: Some dog p00p. Then you give up, but you never noticed how far down that hole you really were. So now you're stuck. Waiting for someone to pull you out of that hole. OR If you're really strong, you can climb out of it. That takes experience and a strong heart. Sooooo...how do you like my story? It just started off with that first paragraph...then I decided: Hell! why not go all the way! So, Enjoy! haha :P Have I found something beautiful? Moving On ------------- Something to realize, which lightened up my heart: It's okay to move on! There is a time to grieve and a time to live. What's done is done, right? There is nothing left to grieve. You don't have to remain in constant sadness. You don't have to be sad to protect yourself, to prevent something from happening. You don't have to remain sad to show that you cared. You can live on! Really, it does not matter what went past, that's freaking gone! You may remember it, acknowledge it, But there is absolutely NO point in meddling around in sadness of the past; when there is so much happiness right in front of you! Here's a song to express what I'm trying to say better: Eagles, The - Desperado Desperado, why don’t you come to your senses You been out ridin’ fences for so long now Oh you’re a hard one I know that you got your reasons These things that are pleasin' you Can hurt you somehow Don’t you draw the queen of diamonds boy She’ll beat you if she’s able You know the queen of heats is always your best bet Now it seems to me some fine things Have been laid upon your table But you only want the ones that you can’t get [SO true!] Desperado, oh you ain’t gettin' no younger Your pain and your hunge’ they’re drivin’ you home And freedom, oh freedom well that’s just some people talkin’ Your prison is walking through this world all alone Don’t your feet get cold in the winter time The sky won’t snow and the sun won’t shine It’s hard to tell the night time from the day You’re loosin’ all your highs and lows Ain’t it funny how the feeling goes away [haha, ya! ...I thought they'd never go away...but they do!] Desperado, why don’t you come to your senses Come down from your fences open the gate It may be rainin’ but there’s a rainbow above you You better let somebody love you before it’s too late You better let somebody love you....before it’s too late ASK AND I SEND! mmm, I like the word 'sometimes' It's...so indefinite! I love it! And Ash has a song called sometimes too, sooo :P Cigarettes keep you skinny And your mind off your weight Anyways! Yeah 'Sometimes', here are some: Sometimes you hate...because you care too much Sometimes you love...because you can't help it. Sometimes you cast away love...because you know you can't hold on Sometimes you turn a cold shoulder...because you are afraid of what turning a warm smile may do Sometimes you supress your wants...because you know your wants will only cause pain Sometimes you feel helpless...because you are, and you care too much Sometimes you do what you need to...because in the end, you feel great about it (which leads me to wonder what's better? Feel like crap first, then feel good later: or :Feel 'Just like Heaven[The Cure]' then feel like crap?) Sometimes you let your feelings take over...because we're you're only human Sometimes life gets us down... BUT the ones who care about us are always there to lift us back up!! :D And that's where your priorities should be, I think, to repay and give all you can to those who have been by your side, fighting off life, picking you up, shutting them up :D :D Things go alright, which is more than good :D haha! P.S. Yeah...those 'sometimes' things I just shot out, most of those you's are more like 'I am' or 'I' But it just sounds too personal and too directly linked to me...if that makes any sense, haha! :P Ok, well here's a song that's says something that is slowly creeping into MY life...unfortunately, or fortunately? Who knows. Am I ignorant now or before? Who knows. Dashboard Confessional - The Places You have come to Fear the Most Buried deep as you can dig inside yourself, And covered with a perfect shell, Such a charming beautiful exterior. Laced with brilliant smiles and shining eyes Perfect posture but you're barely scraping by But you’re barely scraping by This is one time, That you can't fake it hard enough to please everyone or anyone at all. And the grave that you refuse to leave The refuge that you've built to flee The places you have come to fear the most. [That's kinda what's creeping up...*shrugs*] Such a stellar monument to loneliness. Laced with brilliant smiles and shining eyes And perfect makeup but you're barely scraping by. But you’re barely scraping by So yeah, basically the chorus is the biggy The place I have built to take me away from where I was, is now a curse. It's not working out the way I wish it had, maybe this is my lesson? the hard way. Been at two extremes...where is the middle ground? Can I find it? But I'm too afraid to leave this place I have built, I don't know anything else now. What if there is nothing better outside these walls I have built? What if I stumble into another abyss? I'm just too scared, so why bother doing anything? We live, and we die. Simple. We live, we die But I don't understand the reasons we ask "Why?"
How obvious is obvious? Just wondering...Everyone has their own sense of that, eh? It's just very interesting.. :P p00p for thought! :D

I want to read good new! But nothing good is happening! - Something Corporate You want to read some good news? Well here is some!!! I'm semi-happy!!! :P (Semi-charmed Life!!!) Haha...holding out, and following my advice/theories seems to have worked out this time...which will lead me to continue my life as is! And what may those theories be? Well let's see, how to put it simlpy... RUN AWAY BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE!!! DON'T LET YOUR HEART GUIDE YOU! ANNND!! Keep up that fake smile! Pretend your happy! Then you'll die 'happy'!! :P Or else you'll have to deal with too much crap! Yeah...that's what I do, and that's what has kept me here, alive, and well. Everything just works out nicely..see if I didn't do what I promised myself etc, then things would probably be very different, Thank god that's not true!! So yeah, now I'm kinda happy because I what I'm doing is right and works out just fine for me! How do I know that it's working out? I'm not crying. WeeeeEEEEeeee!!! ------ Being alone can be sad and lonely sometimes. Sometimes you just wanna...well yeah do things, you just want to feel that 'happiness' again. Then you look at yourself right now, and see, "hey, I guess I'm kinda happy, things are alright!" So that's always good. But, seriously, what other options do you have? At least being alone does have some very good advantages...such as...it won't break you, you won't have much to care about...hmmm lots more! I was just looking at a post I made...in January or so... The things that hurt you the most Are the things you care about the most How stupid is that? SOLUTION! Don't care much about anything!!! Hahaha...la la la This isn't making sense...but makes sense to me! yah! That's all that matters :P One day, I'm going to look back at all of these and see how dumb I was, and how many years I have wasted...but better to waste the years, rather than crying your years away! Meet me on the South Beach, my 'lil Georgia Peach! Wow...it's been so long!!! Time to catch up! I have so many things to say! I probably forgot most...hopefully not the important parts :P This will be a bunch of rambling that I was thinking about over my holiday. So it'll be scattered and stuff. I found that leaving every social scene, it really helps you relax. Helps you think. Throughout the whole time, I was missing...And I longed to return! It was like...I was reliving something! Amazing! I was watchign Along came Polly and the guy's dad said something to the effect that " Something good can pass us by when we least exepected it. No matter how hard we tried to prepare for it " Now that's pretty good! And I wonder...I just wonder, has something good passed me by? Or is it still not too late? That is for time to see!! hmmm, ok next "topic" This is a kind of weird thing I thought of and felt...It's probably something only I would think of or feel...very strange :P But here it goooeees! Ok,getting over a person is one thing. It can be very hard...but we do eventually in one way or another... The next step (for me) was even harder...: The fact that we feel(no matter what), and we do fall in love(even thought it is probably one of the stupidest things ever). And this love drives our lives in some way or another, and I guess it's kinda important to acknowledge it, rather than shun it and let it eat at you. It's more hurtful to force loneliness upon yourself than to embrace a love...I guess that's what I'm trying to say... So these walls...I wonder if they do more harm than good...We can't stop our heart from feeling, so why shut it off?
